name: repo_id
description: the unique identity of a repository where this event was tragered

name: actor_id
description: GitHub user id of someone who trigger this event instance

name: actor_login
description: GitHub user login of someone who trigger this event instance

name: issue_comment
description: the number of `issue comment` aggregate on repo_id,actor_id,week,hour

name: open_issue
description: the number of `open issue` aggregate on repo_id,actor_id,week,hour

name: open_pull
description: the number of `open pull` aggregate on repo_id,actor_id,week,hour

name: pull_review_comment
description: the number of `pull review comment` aggregate on repo_id,actor_id,week,hour

name: merge_pull
description: the number of `merge pull` aggregate on repo_id,actor_id,week,hour
